mapper.update: update sys_user_role set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, role_id, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time from sys_user_role
